title: John Hennessey
description: Newly annointed creator of the world's fastest production vehicle (the Venom GT) John Hennessey swings by to have a chat.  In addition to the record setting run, we talk about the McLaren P1, the Porsche 918, working with NASA the scrutineers at Guinness and the current insanity of the hypercar world.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
